item.title: long long time no C*! (type journal essay)
item.description: Well, hi! How are you human/computer? I really hope there are no under voltage warnings in your log. What have I been doing all this time? Well, mainly, I’ve been chewing gum and making pretty bubbles with it (ending up smashing my whole face) and contemplating this mad world with my hands in my pockets. (Pretty much like this) credits: bubblegumkids.xyz Okay, I was kidding! Actually the most remarkable thing that I achieved last months it’s (drumroll…) I learnt React!
